sys_ux_client_script.name: TriggerDataRefreshTier2

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_fbb20a851b7f155062e50ed2cd4bcb81
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="SOW Overview Tier2 SNC">cdb246851b7f155062e50ed2cd4bcbf0</macroponent><name>TriggerDataRefreshTier2</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const eventName = event.name;
    if (eventName == "SOW_MODAL#ACTION_STATUS" || eventName == "NOW_RECORD_LIST_CONNECTED#INLINE_EDITING_VALIDATE_UPDATE_RECORDS_COMPLETED" || event.payload.action.actionType == 'server_script') {
        api.data.fetch_evam_data_1.refresh();
        var jsonObj = [];
        if (api.state.parFilters.length == 0) {
            jsonObj.push({
                "order": 100,
                "type": "boolean",
                "apply_to": ["u_invoice.active"],
                "values": ["true"]
            });
        }
        api.setState('parFilters', () => jsonObj);
        api.setState('listRefreshRequested', {
             timestamp: new Date().getTime()
          });
        api.data.get_datetime_now.refresh(); 
        api.data.fetch_selected_visualization_record_count.refresh();   
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-14 13:54:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>fbb20a851b7f155062e50ed2cd4bcb81</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TriggerDataRefreshTier2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Invoice Portal" source="d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2">d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Invoice Portal">d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fbb20a851b7f155062e50ed2cd4bcb81</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-14 14:55:45</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
